newsitem.title: USA: Greentree names Joseph Mooney CEO.
newsitem.headline: Greentree names Joseph Mooney CEO.

text.p: Greentree Software Inc said it named Joseph Mooney to its board of directors and to the position of chief executive officer.
He was previously retained as a consultant in August 1996 to assist the company in product marketing and establishing strategy, Greentree said.
Mooney replaced John Medico, who left the company, it said.
Greentree also said it closed a private placement of convertible notes, common shares and warrants.
The company raised gross proceeds of $790,000 in the offering, it said.
The funds are being used for working capital and to fund the marketing of the company's software.
The company also said it is in the process of preparing its proxy materials and expects to hold its annual meeting of shareholders in late January or February of 1997.
